location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Beeawur [Beāwar] Agency - D.O. Letters from Mr Robertson'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: The contents of the file have been foliated in the top right hand corner of the recto of each folio.Conservation: The correspondence was originally tied together with red string, which was removed to enable the items to be read fully, and placed in a plastic sleeve at the rear of the file.

mods.abstract: Demi-official letters from Captain Donald Robertson, Political Agent at Beawur [Beāwar], to Colonel Lewis Pelly, Leslie Seymour Saunders (Commissioner at Ajmer), and Herbert Mills Repton (Deputy Commissioner of Ajmer Mewara [Mewra]).The correspondence discusses arrangements for translating an address given by Pelly, administrative matters in Beawar, and arrangements for Pelly to visit the Agency.
